amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds in the bill to supersede State law in those States that have legalized the use of medical marijuana.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by various states to prevent any of them from implementing their own laws that authorize the use, distribution, possessions, or cultivation of medical marijuana.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 186 (Roll no. 283).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A064) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 186 (Roll no. 283).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A064) offered by Mr. Rohrabacher.
